channel.title: [PI] Woodcutting Help [PI]

item.title: [PI] Woodcutting Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @nearfatality nearfatality
item.description:
@nearfatality wrote:

Help please I was following a tutorial here and it failed fixed some but stuck with 14 errors.

This is in my client.java

if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } wcTimer--;

And this is the error I get :L

src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: illegal start of type if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: <identifier> expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: ';' expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: illegal start of type if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: ']' expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: illegal start of type if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: <identifier> expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: ';' expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: illegal start of type if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: <identifier> expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:143: ';' expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Client.java:144: <identifier> expected wcTimer--; ^ 12 errors Press any key to continue . . .

What am I suppose to do?

Read full topic
